title: my game wont work
body: when ever i try and get into draft pick my game goes black when i get into champ pick my game goes black i had to reinstall my game last night and that worked for a bit but it just did the same thing after i updated my game please help

replies.body: The black screens are usually caused by a network issue that's failing to connect to the game server and download assets.  Use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this and resolve this and get back in game!  Let me know if you have any questions.
